name: Blooming Boots
description:
Blooming Boots

Play as a plant on the hunt for some refreshing water while trying to get back home. Unlock new characters along the way and once home, you can explore freely and grow your own fruit!

Switch between characters in all 3 levels, each having different jumping abilities. Avoid pits, caterpillars and bubbling lava.

Choose to explore various locations at the end of the game  such as cliffs, caves and the swamps. See if you can discover all hidden features in each area.
